import sys

while 1:
    try:
        t=raw_input()
        a=sys.stdin.readline().split()
        sum=0
        a.reverse()
        foo=" "
        
        l=len(a)

        for j in range(0,l):
            a[j]=int(a[j])
            sum=sum+a[j]
            print(a[j]),
            print(foo),
            
        print(foo)    
            
        print sum
    
    except:
        break
